attributes.action: take Catherine Tate off the air by any means possible
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We ask the Prime Minister to use his influence to ensure that we, the general public of Great Britain, never have to sit through another episode of 'The Catherine Tate Show' and that all catchphrases from the program such as "am I boverrred", are made illegal with immediate effect. Also, we call upon the Prime Minister to make sure that any utterance of such drivel by any member of the public results in an extra long jail sentence.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
